songs.title: World Wide Woman
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
I'm a world wide woman, WWW
You can log on anywhere, your girl can take you there
World wide woman, WWW
You know I'm the type of girl
I'm a world wide woman, WWW
You can log on anywhere, your girl can take you there
World wide woman, WWW
You know I'm the type of girl

[Verse 1]
International, no specific area code
Whether it's them project homes
Overseas, on them cobble stone roads
I can just about upload, what you need, and all the essentials
Believe me, I'm whatcha looking for
Login B, backslash, O-N-C-E, baby

[Chorus]
I'm a world wide woman, WWW
You can log on anywhere, your girl can take you there
World wide woman, WWW
You know I'm the type of girl
I'm a world wide woman, WWW
You can log on anywhere, your girl can take you there
World wide woman, WWW
You know I'm the type of girl

[Verse 2]
If it's like a MAC you own
Maximize the full potential
Baby, if you connect with me
I'm just like your high speed cable
Even if you gotta fly
To where they drive, on the passenger side
I'll be the like the Autobahn
When you get on, you won't know how to let go
Browsing won't do
You got to click right here, come find me
I'll assure you
The places you've never been, I'll take you

[Chorus]
I'm a world wide woman, WWW
You can log on anywhere, your girl can take you there
World wide woman, WWW
You know I'm the type of girl
I'm a world wide woman, WWW
You can log on anywhere, your girl can take you there
World wide woman, WWW
You know I'm the type of girl

[Bridge]
I want love, like any world wide woman would need
I know you think that can't be
Still got sensitivity
In my world, it's hard to get authenticity
But you feel so damn real to me
Come take the lead
Enjoy this world with me

[Chorus]
I'm a world wide woman, WWW
You can log on anywhere, your girl can take you there
World wide woman, WWW
You know I'm the type of girl
I'm a world wide woman, WWW
You can log on anywhere, your girl can take you there
World wide woman, WWW
You know I'm the type of girl
I'm a world wide woman, WWW
You can log on anywhere, your girl can take you there
World wide woman, WWW
You know I'm the type of girl
I'm a world wide woman, WWW
You can log on anywhere, your girl can take you there
World wide woman, WWW
You know I'm the type of girl

[Outro]
I'm a world wide woman
I'm a world wide woman
I'm a world wide woman
I'm a world wide woman
